Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the Santa Fe killer expressed his love for Obama, when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the Santa Fe killer loved Obama.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence to support the assertion that the killer loved Obama.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the killer's political allegiances can be determined based on false information.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on fake news stories and misinformation to make its assertion.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias in this claim.
